title: Alternator Regulator/Rectifier - Removal

body.body: The alternator regulator/rectifier is attached to the cradle assembly at the rear of the radiator. The regulator/rectifier does not contain any serviceable parts and must be replaced if faulty.

body.body: If the motorcycle has recently been running, some components may be hot to the touch. Contact with the hot components may cause damage to exposed skin. To avoid skin damage, always allow the hot parts to cool before working on the motorcycle.
Note the position of the electrical connectors for installation.
Release and discard the two fixings securing the regulator/rectifier bracket to the cradles.
Disconnect both electrical connectors and remove the regulator/rectifier and it's bracket.
Release the fixings and remove the regulator/rectifier from it's bracket.
